text:
e="preserve">Éric Assous (30 March 1956 – 12 October 2020) was a Tunisian-born French director, screenwriter and dramatist. He was born in Tunis, Tunisia. Assous was known for directing and writing "The Banned Woman", "The Girl from Paris" and "22 Bullets".
Assous died on 12 October 2020 in Paris at the age of 64.
